name: Wai Tong
description: Wai Tong is responsible for investment research focused on the North American Telecommunication Services and Industrials sectors. Since joining AGF in 2006, Wai has been working closely with the North American portfolio management team, contributing both top-down and bottom-up equity analysis. His contribution to the generation of ideas for the portfolios includes financial modeling and meetings with the management of companies considered for the portfolios.
